title: At Least 49 Migrants Killed in Truck Crash in Southern Mexico
sub_head: Mexican authorities say at least 58 were injured after the truck crashed into a bridge
body:
MEXICO CITY—A trailer truck jammed full of Central American migrants crashed Thursday into a pedestrian bridge, killing at least 49 migrants and injuring 58 others in southern Mexico, authorities said.
The accident occurred Thursday afternoon on the road leading into Tuxtla Gutiérrez, the capital of Chiapas state.
